document_data.name: Neerg
document_data.mainbody: '''Neerg''' was a [[wizard]] and a member of the [[Shadow Thieves]] in [[Esmeltaran]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Neerg was easily frustrated by people who could not understood his instructions or who were condescending to him.
document_data.Abilities: Neerg specialized in [[divination]] and [[counterspell]] [[magic]]. He was famous among the Shadow Thieves for his creation of a long-lasting variant of the ''[[knock]]'' spell.
document_data.Activities: Neerg worked as a support for burglars and assassins in his city.
